name: The Discreation of Lucifer
description: The final chapter awaits you! The third in the Lucifer Trilogy has been set into motion! You destroyed Lucifer's palace in Lucifer's Hole of Despair, and you won against his minions once more in Desimation. Now awaits the third and final chapter of this trilogy! Lucifer HIMSELF awaits you in The Discreation of Lucifer!
